description:

His face is all angles, perfect teeth, and a calm self-assured attitude that isn't cocky.

He's filmed himself for girlfriends, and it sounds like he has filmed himself with a couple too. So he was quite comfortable showing off.
Did I mention how big his dick is?!
He loves to fuck girls up the ass too. Not sure if that translates into fucking a dudes ass, but I am sure gonna make the offer!
title: Devin - Solo
